means: 阳光光束，快乐的人( sunbeam的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: The sunbeams send the blood running gaily through the veins.
sentence.Network_cn: 阳光驱动血液在血管里欢快地流动.

sentence.Network_en: The level evening sunbeams stole through the thick apple - tree boughs.
sentence.Network_cn: 黄昏的平静的太阳光偷偷地穿过苹果树浓密的枝叶射下来.

sentence.Network_en: The sunbeams promised life and happiness and the glory of the unknown.
sentence.Network_cn: 阳光孕育着生命和幸福,孕育着未知的光荣.

thy sunbeam comes upon this earth of mine with arms outstretched and stands at my door the livelong day to carry back to thy feet clouds made of my tears and sighs and songs .你的阳光射到我的地上，整天地伸臂站在我门前，把我的眼泪，叹息和歌曲变成的云彩，带回放在你的足边。

entry.def: A sunbeam is a ray of sunlight.

example.ex: A sunbeam slants through the west window.
example.tran: 一束阳光从西边的窗户斜射进来。

auth_sentence.content: The sunbeams, falling through sycamores, lit up spirals of midges.

auth_sentence.content: Sunbeams in flagstoned lanes split and reformed as Khalil gave me the back story.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sunbeams in flagstoned lanes split and reformed as Khalil gave me the back story.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sunbeams in flagstoned lanes split and reformed as Khalil gave me the back story.

auth_sentence.content: It was a homespun documentary, and it opened with a Technicolor portrait of Chairman Mao, sunbeams radiating from his head.
